text: taṅṅaḷuṭe nāthanēāṭ bhakti pularttiyavar svargattilēkk kūṭṭaṅkūṭṭamāyi nayikkappeṭuṁ. aṅṅane avaraviṭe ettumpēāḷ atinṟe vātilukaḷ avarkkāyi tuṟannuveccavayāyirikkuṁ. atinṟe kāvalkkār arēāṭu paṟayuṁ: "niṅṅaḷkku samādhānaṁ. niṅṅaḷkku nallatu varaṭṭe. sthiravāsikaḷāyi niṅṅaḷitil pravēśiccukeāḷḷuka
